ygData.subject: RE: Need more bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Arrrgggh! I get casters in my groups in their friggin FOURTIES that still get panicy when I weave Hymn in while medding.  They see the Hymn icon but no
ygData.messageBody:
Arrrgggh!

I get casters in my groups in their friggin' FOURTIES that still get panicy
when I weave Hymn in while medding. They see the Hymn icon but no Clarity
icon and they start saying "Mana song! Mana song! WTF!?!?" I've had guys
*disband* calling me "incompetent" because I wouldn't sing pure Clarity, but
insisted on continuing to sing [Clarity, Clarity, Hymn...] when the tanks
were a half-bubble of HPs low. I have yet to find a way to talk to these
pig-headed morons (and yes, they're almost always Wizards). It seems to me
that the amount of DD that a class can do in this game is inversely
proportional to the brains that it takes to run it.

Crier Manasong

> Time for cleric to med back one bubble
> ~100 sec - no songs
> ~63 sec - playing just Clarity
> ~63 sec - stop/starting Clarity with each "mind clears" message
> ~63 sec - playing Clarity + Hymn
> ~76 sec - playing Clarity + Hymn + Accel
>
> L39 cleric, L40 bard.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
